class.name: DiscordStatusType
class.brief_description: Enum that specifies the various online statuses for a user.
class.description: Generally a user is online or offline, but in Discord users are able to further customize their status such as turning on "Do not Disturb" mode or "Dnd" to silence notifications.

constants.constant: The user is online and recently active.
The user is offline and not connected to Discord.
The user is online, but has not been active for a while and may be away from their computer.
The user is online, but wishes to suppress notifications for the time being.
The user is online, but wishes to appear as if they are offline to other users.
The user is online and is actively streaming content.
